member.name: T:LearningNative.FQL
member.summary:
The FQL class provides a CLS compliant, Object (native) interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
C:\Users\pooyanjam\Source\Repos\pooyan-amir\RL-Q\FQL\fqlearn.m
C:\Users\pooyanjam\Source\Repos\pooyan-amir\RL-Q\FQL\fuzzy_action_calculator.m
C:\Users\pooyanjam\Source\Repos\pooyan-amir\RL-Q\FQL\init_knowledge_base.m
C:\Users\pooyanjam\Source\Repos\pooyan-amir\RL-Q\FQL\initq.m
C:\Users\pooyanjam\Source\Repos\pooyan-amir\RL-Q\FQL\update_knowledge_base.m
deployprint.m
printdlg.m
member.remarks: @Version 0.0

member.name: M:LearningNative.FQL.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
